tasks.title: Fix Pricing Page - Complete
tasks.description: Finish Pricing page cleanup: 1) Premium Plan features need proper line breaks (currently only has first line), 2) Strengthen weak middle content, 3) Hero placeholder was fixed. Post ID: 27
